data.message: Speaking about news feed. The phone-app has been acting crazy for a long time. When i want to share, comment or post something, be it in groups, on pages, my own profile, friend's profiles, i just get sent back to the news feed. It's really annoying and has been going on for months. I just got a new phone, had the same problem with my old one. It feels like i'm not allowed to be other places than the newsfeed. Just tried to post in a group four times in a row and just got sent back to the news feed every time ! It's really really annoying. Fix the phone-app, please ! I'm not the only one having this problem either.

replies.message: Hi Mona. If you continue to experience this, please let us know by submitting a report. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2cnpTdA. -Rey
How does that help, it's your phone-app that needs a serious update !
I thought I was the only one!
Ya I have issue with Facebook app I have to use internet stinks
I tried using the same method and it didn't work for me. They never respond.
Do you think they might after I thank the entire staff for their support for Hillary Clinton's Presidency?
Still the same, and i tried to report it days ago...
Still getting sent back to notifications/ news feed. Two times while i wrote this !!!
